text: "Freaking Me Out" is a song by American singer Ava Max, released as a promotional single through Atlantic Records. It was released on July 31, 2019, alongside another promotional single "Blood, Sweat & Tears". A lyric video was released on the same day. The song was written by Max, Jonathan Simpson, Mark Williams, Raul Cubina, Seth Refer, and producer Cirkut. ==Music video== A music video was released on October 31, 2019, exactly 3 months after the song's release, as a Halloween special. It was directed by Edgar Daniel, and depicts Max at the beach and in a dark mansion. ==Track listings== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 29 |} ==References== Category:2019 songs Category:Ava Max songs Category:Songs written by Ava Max Category:Songs written by Cirkut (record producer) Category:Song recordings produced by Cirkut (record producer)
title: Freaking Me Out
